title: Number of arrivals in tourist accommodation Latvia 2006 to 2018
summary: In general Number of arrivals in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of arrivals in millions is roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, gradually increasing from 2012 to 2014, and lastly roughly constant from 2014 to 2015.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum Number of arrivals in millions, about 2.14 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Number of arrivals in millions about 1.58 was reached at Year 2011
min_summary: Overall Number of arrivals in millions has increased over the Year.
